about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in these enchanting melodies as you journey through the captivating landscapes in Distant Bloom.

Crafted to evoke a sense of serenity and wonder, this collection of relaxing and cozy songs serves as the perfect companion to your exploration of the alien world. From tranquil moments of reflection to dramatic crescendos of discovery, each track invites you to uncover the secrets hidden in Distant Bloom as you forge a new home amidst the stars.
